DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesis study administration rectal sublingual misoprostol decrease intrapartum postpartum haemorrhage .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Rectal Sublingual Misoprostol Administration Postpartum Intrapartum Haemorrhage Elective Caesarean Delivery : Randomized Controlled Trial
